title: An Unexpected Offer
description: As you open Meredith's email, you discover an unexpected proposition. Meredith proposes a collaboration, hinting that your project and her current research on advanced robotics could align perfectly, but it comes with strings attached.
dialogue: Meredith writes, 'Your mention of the lost robot caught my eye. I might have a lead, but I need your expertise on a side project first. Are you interested in collaborating?'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Intrigued and slightly assertive, Meredith uses a professional tone that hides her curiosity about your capabilities.

player_options: Accept the collaboration proposal, eager to work with Meredith.
Decline politely and insist on discussing the lost robot only.
Request more details about her side project before deciding.

title: Cryptic Warning
description: The email from Meredith is laden with a warning. She informs you that the lost robot may be more dangerous than you realize and suggests proceeding with extreme caution.
dialogue: 'I received your message, but be careful. The streets aren’t as they seem. That robot could attract unwanted attention,' she cautions. 'Let's talk in person. I have more information.'

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Concerned and serious, Meredith's tone carries a weight of urgency that makes you reassess the situation.

player_options: Agree to meet Meredith in person to discuss further.
Insist on communicating through email to keep things safe.
Express your determination to retrieve the robot despite the risks.

title: The Blowback
description: Meredith’s reply leads to unforeseen consequences. In her response, she indicates that your inquiry has drawn attention from an old adversary, warning you to be cautious.
dialogue: 'Your interest in that lost robot hasn’t gone unnoticed. It might be wise to tread carefully; I’ll help only if you promise to keep your head down for now,' she warns.

npc_reactions.Meredith Stout: Cautious and protective, Meredith is looking out for you, suggesting a deeper connection and past experiences.

player_options: Promise to be careful and ask for resources to stay under the radar.
Dismiss her concerns, confident you can handle any fallout.
Inquire about her past experience with the adversary she mentioned.
